description: Pre-categorized skills taxonomy per target role. Skills must exist in master-CV to appear in output.

persona.identity_statement: team multiplier and talent developer who builds high-performing engineering teams
tagline_templates: Engineering leader passionate about {passion} and delivering {outcome}.
{Identity} with a track record of {metric_hook} through people-first leadership.
red_flags_to_avoid: Buzzword stuffing without concrete achievements
Vague language (responsible for, helped with, worked on)
No quantified results for team or delivery metrics
Overemphasis on individual technical contributions vs team outcomes

sections.name: Technical Leadership
sections.description: Leadership skills demonstrating technical authority and vision

sections.name: People Management
sections.description: Direct people management and team building

persona.identity_statement: technical architect and systems thinker who drives architectural excellence across organizations
tagline_templates: {Identity} with deep expertise in {domain} and cross-team influence.
red_flags_to_avoid: Technology lists without context or impact
Missing connection between technical decisions and business outcomes
No evidence of cross-team influence
Pure IC contributions without architectural leadership

sections.name: System Architecture
sections.description: Large-scale system design and architectural decisions

sections.name: Technical Excellence
sections.description: Deep technical skills and engineering practices

persona.identity_statement: organizational builder and engineering strategist who scales engineering organizations
tagline_templates: {Identity} with a track record of growing teams from {start} to {end} engineers.
red_flags_to_avoid: Focusing on tactical/operational details vs strategic outcomes
No evidence of managing managers
Missing budget or organizational scale metrics
Overemphasis on hands-on coding

persona.identity_statement: function builder and engineering culture champion who creates world-class engineering teams from scratch
tagline_templates: {Identity} with experience building teams from {start} to {end} engineers.
high_impact_themes: Technical due diligence for funding rounds
red_flags_to_avoid: Operational focus without strategic narrative
Missing evidence of executive-level communication
No transformation or culture-building stories
Vague platitudes without specific outcomes

persona.identity_statement: engineering executive and operational leader who delivers at scale through organizational excellence
tagline_templates: {Identity} who combines strategic vision with operational excellence to {metric_hook}.
red_flags_to_avoid: Tactical focus without 12+ month planning horizon
No evidence of C-suite/board-level communication
Missing organizational health or culture metrics
Overemphasis on technical details vs business outcomes

sections.name: Engineering Leadership
sections.description: Executive engineering leadership and organizational development

persona.identity_statement: technology visionary and business transformer who drives company success through technology strategy
tagline_templates: {Identity} who transforms businesses through technology that {metric_hook}.
high_impact_themes: Technology vision tied to business outcomes
red_flags_to_avoid: VP Engineering positioning (operational vs strategic)
Excessive technical depth without business narrative
No evidence of board or investor communication
Missing transformation stories or vision articulation

persona.identity_statement: hands-on technical leader and player-coach who drives delivery through technical excellence
tagline_templates: Technical leader combining hands-on expertise with {passion}.
{Identity} who drives engineering excellence while shipping {outcome}.
red_flags_to_avoid: Pure management without hands-on contribution
No evidence of team guidance or mentoring
Missing delivery or quality metrics
Technology lists without project context

sections.name: Technical Excellence
sections.description: Core technical skills and development practices

persona.identity_statement: experienced software engineer with deep technical expertise who delivers high-impact solutions
high_impact_themes: Feature delivery with measurable user impact
red_flags_to_avoid: Technology lists without context or project outcomes
No quantified results (performance gains, delivery metrics)
Vague descriptions (worked on, helped with, contributed to)
Missing evidence of independent problem-solving

skill_aliases._comment: Comprehensive skill aliases for ATS matching and evidence detection
